document.full_text: cambodian prime minister hun sen offered wednesday to meet one-on-one with his thai counterpart after six days of sporadic fighting that has killed at least 14 people, raising hopes of a ceasefire in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
document.title: cambodia pm welcomes talks after thai border clashes
lines_and_colors: cambodian prime minister hun sen offered wednesday to meet one-on-one with his thai counterpart after six days of sporadic fighting that has killed at least 14 people, raising hopes of a ceasefire in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
